Class CustomConsoleLogger

  • java.lang.Object
    • pl.elka.mkoi.logger.CustomConsoleLogger
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConsoleLogger

    public class CustomConsoleLogger
extends java.lang.Object
implements ConsoleLogger
    Console logger. Logs messages on console using Log4J logger - Logger Implements ConsoleLogger interface.
